metadata.title: CVE-2022-4191 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Sign-In in Google Chrome prior to 108.0.5359.71 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UI interactionto potentially exploit heap corruption via profile destruction. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
